# load the data to variable d

```{r}
library (tidyverse)
f <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/difiore/ada-datasets/main/Country-Data-2016.csv"
d <- read.csv(f)
```

# how many variable

```{r}
ncol(d)
```

# how many observations

```{r}
nrow(d)
```

# how many countries

```{r}
n_distinct(d$country)
```

# median area

```{r}
median(d$area, na.rm = TRUE)
```

# median population size

```{r}
median(d$population, na.rm = TRUE)
```

# create new density: population/area

```{r}
d$density <- d$population/d$area
d$density
```

# 10 most dense country

```{r}
d$density <- d$population/d$area
d <- d[order(d$density, decreasing = TRUE), ]
d[1:10, ]
```

# 10 least dense

```{r}
d <- d[order(d$density), ]
d[1:10, ]
```
